  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    BonusMovementSystem
    The BonusMovementSystem class is responsible for updating the movement of bonuses in the game.
    BulletSystem
    The BulletSystem class manages the movement and position updates of bullets in the game.
    CollisionSystem
    The CollisionSystem class is responsible for detecting collisions between figures and updating their health values accordingly.
    EnemyMovementSystem
    The EnemyMovementSystem class is responsible for updating the movement of enemy entities.
    InputSystem
    The InputSystem class is responsible for updating the input and managing player actions.
    PlayerMovementSystem
    The PlayerMovementSystem class is responsible for updating the movement of player entities.
